case_title: United States of America v. Dattilio
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Dattilio

charges.charge_description: 18:2252(a)(2)Receipt/Distribution of Visual Depictions of Minors Engaged in Sexually Explicit Conduct(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a period of 360 months. Ten years each count of supervised release with special conditions. Fine waived. Restitution not ordered. Special Assessment of $100.00 on each count. Total $300.00.

Committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a period of 360 months. Ten years each count of supervised release with special conditions. Fine waived. Restitution not ordered. Special Assessment of $100.00 on each count. Total $300.00.

Committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a period of 240 months. Ten years each count of supervised release with special conditions. Fine waived. Restitution not ordered. Special Assessment of $100.00 on each count. Total $300.00.
